a.span: Form for students to request their transcript

article.class: post-19818 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.h2: 07 Apr TEECS STRONG during Covid-19 Quarantine
div.div:
Posted at 15:26h in News by admin
Share

div.class: wpb_video_widget wpb_content_element vc_clearfix vc_video-aspect-ratio-169 vc_video-el-width-100 vc_video-align-left

div.p: Thomas Edison EnergySmart Charter School is continuing to spread school spirit. Each week is a theme for our students to have some fun and feel connected to their classmates, teachers and school. Each day students and parents upload photos of themselves enjoying the theme and those photos are posted and shared on Facebook.
Monday, March 30th was Scavenger Hunt Day where students were encouraged to hunt for a specific list of items around the house.
Tuesday, March 31st was Tropical Tuesday where students were encouraged to wear their favorite vacation clothes.
Wednesday, April 1st was April Fools Day where students were encouraged to share their favorite jokes.

Thursday, April 2nd was Real-Life Superhero Day where students were encouraged to make signs or record a message to their favorite superhero (nurses, doctors, grocery clerks, policemen, firemen, military, etc.).
Friday, April 3rd was Fan Friday where students were encouraged to show support for their favorite sports team.

These are uncharted waters for our schools but TEECS realizes that it’s our responsibility to ensure our students are taken care of not just academically but socially and emotionally. We are here for our school community and will get through this with the support of each other.
